definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia

sentences.english: Your boyfriend should not be in charge of your clitoris.
sentences.chinese: 你男友不应该管你的阴蒂，它属于你。

sentences.english: he modern, anatomically correct definition of the clitoris was developed by the FFWHCs.
sentences.chinese: 现代解剖学上正确的阴蒂定义为FFWHCs所作出。

sentences.english: Though ‘clitoris’ was still a source of confusion.
sentences.chinese: 虽然“阴蒂”这个词仍是一个造成困惑的源头。

sentences.english: Veins then carry blood out of the clitoris.
sentences.chinese: 然后，血液又经由血管从阴蒂输送出来。

sentences.english: Once the clitoris is clearly erect and visible, you're on your way to orgasm.
sentences.chinese: 一旦骄立的阴蒂清楚可见，你就踏上里高潮之路。

sentences.english: The shaft now feels like a big round rubber band.
sentences.chinese: 阴蒂体现在感觉起来就像一根圆柱状的大橡皮筋。

sentences.english: Sometimes only part of the clitoris is paired, i.e. it branches towards the upper end.
sentences.chinese: 有时阴蒂仅仅部分地成对，即是说它朝上端分支。

sentences.english: Society is giving girls, she concludes, a "psychological clitoridectomy."
sentences.chinese: 她总结道，社会给了女孩做了“精神阴蒂切除术”。

sentences.english: The legs of the clitoris flare out somewhat like the wish bone of a chicken.
sentences.chinese: 分展而开的阴蒂脚有些像鸡胸上叉状的如愿骨。

sentences.english: The glans can still be felt, but not as easily.
sentences.chinese: 阴蒂头也许仍能感觉到，但不那么容易了。

sentences.english: Orgasms of the clitoris are the most common and usually the strongest ones.
sentences.chinese: 阴蒂高潮时这当中最普片也是最强烈的。

sentences.english: Place two fingers side by side over the top of your clitoris.
sentences.chinese: 把两根手指并在一起，放于阴蒂之上。

sentences.english: The glans pokes its enlarged head from beneath the hood.
sentences.chinese: 阴蒂头从包皮下探出它膨胀了的头。

sentences.english: You know where her clit is, right?
sentences.chinese: 你知道她阴蒂在哪对吧？

sentences.english: Several layers of muscles line the pelvic floor, connecting the clitoris to these erectile tissues.
sentences.chinese: 排列在盆腔内一些肌肉层将阴蒂和这些海绵组织链接。

sentences.english: Place a fingertip on each side of your clitoris, sliding them up and down and back again.
sentences.chinese: 把指尖放于阴蒂的每一边，上下并且往复滑动游走。
